KPK Pamggil 4 Saksi Tersangka Darman Mappangara, Dugaan Suap Baggage Handling System
04 Nov 2019, 10:37 by Eko Sulestyono


KPK Pamggil 4 Saksi Tersangka Darman Mappangara, Dugaan Suap Baggage Handling System

KBRN, Jakarta : Penyidik Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK) hari ini dijadwalkan memanggil 4 orang saksi terkait kasus dugaan Tindak Pidana Korupsi (Tipikor) suap proyek pengerjaan sistem penanganan bagasi atau Baggage Handling System (BHS) di PT . Angkasa Pura II (Persero).
Proyek ini nantinya akan dikelola PT. Angkasa Pura Propertindo (APP), sedangkam PT Industri Telekomunikasi Indonesia (INTI) ditunjuk sebagai pelaksana proyek Tahun 2019.
Kabiro Humas KPK Febri Diansyah kepada wartawan di Jakarta mengatakan 4 orang saksi tersebut dijadwalkan akan diperiksa untuk tersangka Darman Mappangara,  mantan Direktur Utama (Dirut) PT. INTI (Persero).
"Dijadwalkan pemeriksaan terhadap empat orang saksi untuk tersangka DMP terkait tindak pidana korupsi suap pekerjaan 'Baggage Handling System' (BHS) pada PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo (APP) yang dilaksanakan oleh PT Industri Telekomunikasi Indonesia (INTI) Tahun 2019," kata Febri Diansyah di Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2019).
Febri menjelaskan bahwa kermpat saksi yang akan diperiksa diantaranya Senior Vice President of Corporate Secretary PT Angkasa Pura II Agus Heryadi, mantan Senior Officer SBU Defense and Digital Service PT INTI Andi Nugroho, Managing Director PT Laju Kurnia Jaya Tris Tabah Laju dan Endang Suherman, sopir pribadi Darman Mappangara.
Sementara itu penyidik KPk sebelumnya telah menetapkan 2 orang tersangka dalam kasus ini, masing-masing mantan Direktur Keuangan PT Angkasa Pura II Andra Agussalam dan Taswin Nur (TSW) dari pihak swasta atau teman dekat Darman Mappangara.
Tersangka Taswin, saat ini sedang mengalami proses persidangan di Pengadilan Tindak Pidana Korupsi (Tipikor) Jakarta. Taswin didakwa menjadi perantara suap kepada Andra sebesar 71 ribu Dolar Amerika (USD) dan 96.700 Dolar Singapura (AUD).
KPK menduga bahwa tujuan pemberian uang tersebut agar mengupayakan PT INTI menjadi pelaksana pekerjaan dalam pengadaan dan pemasangan Semi Baggage Handling System (BHS) di Kantor Cabang PT Angkasa Pura (AP) II antara PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo (APP) dan PT INTI.
PT INTI diketahui merupakan salah satu Badan Usaha Milik Negara (BUMN) yang bergerak dalam bidang telekomunikasi dan teknologi informasi.

KPK Pamggil 4 Witness Suspect Darman Mappangara, Alleged Bribery Baggage Handling System
04 Nov 2019, 10:37 by Eko Sulestyono


KPK Pamggil 4 Witness Suspect Darman Mappangara, Alleged Bribery Baggage Handling System

KBRN, Jakarta: Investigators of the Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK) today are scheduled to summon 4 witnesses related to a case of alleged Corruption (Tipikor) bribery for the project handling the baggage handling system or the Baggage Handling System (BHS) at PT. Angkasa Pura II (Persero).
This project will be managed by PT. Angkasa Pura Propertindo (APP), as short as PT Industri Telekomunikasi Indonesia (INTI) was appointed as the project implementer in 2019.
KPK Head of Public Relations, Febri Diansyah, told reporters in Jakarta that the 4 witnesses were scheduled to be questioned for the suspect Darman Mappangara, former President Director of PT. INTI (Persero).
"It is scheduled to examine four witnesses for a DMP suspect in connection with the 'Baggage Handling System' (BHS) corruption at PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo (APP) carried out by PT Industri Telekomunikasi Indonesia (INTI) in 2019," said Febri Diansyah in Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019).
Febri explained that the four witnesses to be questioned included PT Angkasa Pura II Senior Vice President of Corporate Secretary Agus Heryadi, former PT INTI SBU Defense and Digital Service Senior Officer Andi Nugroho, Managing Director of PT Laju Kurnia Jaya Tris Tabah Laju and Endang Suherman, personal driver Darman Mappangara.
Meanwhile KPK investigators had previously named 2 suspects in this case, each of them being the former Finance Director of PT Angkasa Pura II Andra Agussalam and Taswin Nur (TSW) from a private party or a close friend of Darman Mappangara.
The suspect Taswin, is currently undergoing a trial in the Corruption Court (Corruption) Jakarta. Taswin was charged with being a bribe broker to Andra in the amount of 71 thousand US Dollars (USD) and 96,700 Singapore Dollars (AUD).
The KPK suspects that the purpose of giving the money is to make PT INTI the executor of the work in the procurement and installation of the Semi Baggage Handling System (BHS) at the PT Angkasa Pura (AP) II Branch Office between PT Angkasa Pura Propertindo (APP) and PT INTI.
PT INTI is known as one of the State-Owned Enterprises (SOEs) which is engaged in telecommunications and information technology.
